text: Kambolam is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Baiju Kottarakkara, starring Babu Antony and Charmila in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Babu Antony as Tharakandam Daniel/Dany * Charmila as Pavizham * Rajan P Dev as Tharakkandam Thomichan * Ratheesh as Tharakkandam Kariya * Shammi Thilakan as Tharakandam Thankachan * Saikumar as Tharakandam Roychen * Mahesh as Tharakandam Ommachen * Baiju as Tharakandam Sunnichen * Vinu Chakravarthy as Murugaraj Gounder * Sathaar as Peravahakan * Thesni Khan * Ponnambalam * Mala Aravindan as Kottayam Kochappi * Ragini as Mollykutty * Manju Satheesh * Sonia Baiju * Philomina as Alphonsa * Jagannadha Varma as Narayana Iyyer * Prathapachandran as Subramaniya Iyyer * Mariya as Sunnichen's Girlfriend ==References== ==External links== * ==VIEW THE FILM== KAMBOLAM Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kambolam
